purpose.summary: This PSB defines a single database PCB named PAUTLPCB for accessing the IMS database DBDNAME=DBPAUTP0 with PROCOPT=L (enabling unqualified segment searches) and KEYLEN=14. It specifies two retrievable segments: PAUTSUM0 as the root segment (PARENT=0) and PAUTDTL1 as its child segment under PAUTSUM0. Application programs linked to PSBNAME=PSBPAUTL use this PCB to perform DL/I calls for segment retrieval.
purpose.business_context: IMS database access interface for DBPAUTP0, likely supporting authorization or utility functions based on naming (PAUTL)

inputs.name: SSAs
inputs.description: Segment Search Arguments provided by application programs for qualified or unqualified searches on PAUTSUM0 (root) and PAUTDTL1 (child) segments, limited by KEYLEN=14

outputs.name: PAUTSUM0
outputs.description: Root segment retrievable via SSAs from DBPAUTP0 database

outputs.name: PAUTDTL1
outputs.description: Child segment under PAUTSUM0, retrievable via SSAs from DBPAUTP0 database

fields_used: Segment keys up to 14 bytes via SSAs

open_questions.question: Exact meaning and implications of PROCOPT=L
open_questions.context: Standard IMS documentation not present in source; known to enable unqualified SSAs but full permissions (e.g., read-only vs. update) unclear without IMS manual reference
open_questions.suggestion: Consult IMS PSB/PSBGEN documentation for PROCOPT=L details

open_questions.question: Specific business purpose of DBPAUTP0 database and segments PAUTSUM0/PAUTDTL1
open_questions.context: Inferred from naming (PAUTL suggests Payment Authorization Utility) but not explicitly stated
open_questions.suggestion: Review DBD source for DBPAUTP0 or application programs using this PSB
